ffect on Maternal 
and Perinatal Health 
Outcomes in Facilities 
Maternal and perinatal outcome indicators 
reflect how effective SMGL interventions have 
been in improving Basic and Comprehensive 
EmONC in health facilities. SMGL-supported staff 
tracked several impact and outcome indicators 
of MCH services, including the following:
  Institutional delivery rate in EmONC facilities.
  Active Management of the Third 
Stage of Labor (AMTSL) rate.
  C-section rate.
  Met need for EmONC.
